inclusion.criterion: Able to sign Informed Consent and Release of Medical Information forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Undergoing MVS for degenerative MR with (a) Moderate TR as determined by transthoracic 2D echocardiography, or (b) Tricuspid annular dimension ≥ 40 mm (index: ≥21mm/M2 BSA)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: and trace/mild TR, determined by echocardiography.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of sub-optimal fluid management (e.g., lack of diuretics, weight in excess of dry weight) in the opinion of the cardiology investigator
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
